name: Banashri Karmakar
body:
**Name :** Banashri Karmakar **Address :** Village : Bhadiswar, P.O. + P.S. - Murarai, District : Birbhum **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2016 **Mentor :** Sumit Mandal (Rajabajar Science College, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhyamik : 89.7% ; Higher Secondary : 92%  **Present Course :** Bengali (UG II) Kabi Nazrul College

Banashri lives with her parents and a younger sister in a one-room thatched hut, in the village of Bhadiswar near Murarai in Birbhum. The sole breadwinner in the family is her father who works in a local cycle repairing shop. Poverty and abject conditions notwithstanding, Banashri went on to score 92% in her Higher Secondary with generous help from some of her school teachers. She joined Kabi Nazrul College in 2016 to pursue a bachelor’s in Bengali. Srijan Sujan has promised to assist her in her endeavours.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
